constraint_description: The higher number the block, the heavier it is. Once, you start moving blocks, do not stack heavier blocks on lighter blocks.
The higher number the block, the heavier it is. Once you start moving blocks, do not stack lighter blocks on heavier blocks.
Once you start moving blocks, no stack should be more than 2 blocks high.
Once you start moving blocks, no stack should be more than 3 blocks high.
Once you start moving blocks, no stack should be more than 4 blocks high.
Once you start moving blocks, no stack should be more than 5 blocks high.
Once you start moving blocks, you must have exactly 10 stacks at any time.
The weight of each block is its number. Once you start moving blocks, the total weight above a block should not exceed the weight of the block itself.
Once you start moving blocks, you must have exactly 6 stacks at any time.
Once you start moving blocks, you must have no more than 1 stacks at any time.
Once you start moving blocks, you must have no more than 2 stacks at any time.
Once you start moving blocks, you must have no more than 3 stacks at any time.
Once you start moving blocks, you must have exactly 3 stacks at any time.
Once you start moving blocks, you must have exactly 4 stacks at any time.
Once you start moving blocks, you must have exactly 5 stacks at any time.
Once you start moving blocks, the sum of the block numbers in each stack should not exceed 5.
